category: Korean University Sports Committee Regulations/Article 13 (Convocation of General Meeting)
contents: Article 13 (Convening a general meeting) ① The general meeting of members is divided into a regular general meeting and an extraordinary general meeting, and the chairman or chairperson convenes them. Revised May 15, 2017. ② The regular general meeting shall be convened within three months after the end of each fiscal year. Revised May 15, 2017. ③ The extraordinary general meeting must be convened within two weeks when there is a written request from the standing committee or more than two-thirds of the members. Revised May 15, 2017 [Moved from Article 10, Previous Article 13 moved to Article 20 May 15, 2017] [Title Revised May 15, 2017]
